site_name: The Gardeners Arms Public House, 18 Burnside Avenue, Chingford, London, E4 8YJ
description: Demolition of existing single-storey rear extension at ground floor level to form two patio gardens. Construction of a first floor roof terrace with amenity space and obscure-glazed glass screen surround, in connection with change of use from former Public House and two flats (Mixed use class A4/C3) to four residential units (Class C3)-2 x2-bedroom, 2 x 3-bedroom flats. Alterations to fenestration at front and side elevations including installation of new and replacement windows and alterations to front canopy. Provision for internal cycle storage and sheltered refuse storage.
